sentences.en: a module in mathematics
sentences.cn: 数学课的一个单元

sentences.en: A rescue plan could be achieved by sending an unmanned module to the space station.
sentences.cn: 营救计划可以通过向空间站发送一个无人舱来完成。

sentences.en: A ride in the lunar module's upper stage was quite an experience.
sentences.cn: 在登月舱上半截的一次驾驶,可真是一次难得的经验.

sentences.en: Chinese font LCD Module User's Guide TBM 12864 - 12 , introduced in detail.
sentences.cn: 中文字库液晶显示模块使用手册TBM12864 -12, 介绍详细.

sentences.en: End of POST initialization of chipset registers. De - initializes the ADM module.
sentences.cn: 为上 电自检 末期初始化芯片寄存器,不初始化ADM模块.

sentences.en: Furthermore the module contains registration of and control over production tools.
sentences.cn: 另外特殊定单模块还可以登记和控制生产工具.

sentences.en: He has 250 students in his microeconomics module.
sentences.cn: 他的微观经济学授课单元有250名学生。

sentences.en: In the user administration module, you can delete users as administration authority.
sentences.cn: 管理员管理用户界面,主要是对用户删除操作.

sentences.en: In this step, you create a new module for the selector.
sentences.cn: 在此步骤中，您将为选择器创建一个新的模块。

sentences.en: Independent display module lessen project cost and make interface variety.
sentences.cn: 设计了独立的人机界面模块,减少了工程造价.

sentences.en: Insert disc holder assembly back into the seat module.
sentences.cn: 将阀座固定器总成插回到阀座模块内.

sentences.en: Keep the pre - apparatus's advantage, design new software and update hardware sampling module.
sentences.cn: 在保留已有仪器优点上, 全新设计软件系统,更新硬件采样部分.

sentences.en: Replace seat module with new component by placing into body seat bore.
sentences.cn: 用新组件更换阀座模块,将其放置到阀体阀座镗孔内.

sentences.en: Switch from one module to another.
sentences.cn: 从一个模块转换到另一个模块。

sentences.en: The B - module MB is said to be obtained from M by extension of scalars.
sentences.cn: 我们说B - 核MB是从M验纯量扩充而得到的.

sentences.en: The fault diagnosis module is important in the bucket loader automation system.
sentences.cn: 故障诊断模块是煤矿堆取料机自动控制系统的重要模块.

sentences.en: The perfectly geometrical simulation module model of warship wake was established.
sentences.cn: 摘要建立了较完备的尾流仿真模型,给出了尾流空穴模型和机动目标尾流的正确描述.

sentences.en: Then N is said to be a flat A - module.
sentences.cn: 那么,N叫做平坦A -- 模.

sentences.en: While one of the astronauts went round the moon in the command module, the other went down to the surface in the lunar module.
sentences.cn: 当其中一名宇航员在指挥舱中环绕月球飞行时, 另一名宇航员在登月舱中降落到月球表面.

sentences.en: You choose five modules in the first year.
sentences.cn: 第一年你要选择五个单元。

sentences.en: You then iterate the modules that depended on you and remove this module from their lists.
sentences.cn: 然后迭代具有依赖性的模块，并将这个模块从这些列表中删除。

phrases.tran_cn: 功能模块；功能微型组件
寄存信息块；输入程序片；载入模组；装配模块
（宇宙飞船的）服务舱，供应舱；业务模块；推进舱
太阳能电池组件；太阳能模组

trans.tran_cn: 模块，组件，（宇宙飞船上各个独立的）舱，测量流水等的单位
trans.tran_en: one of several parts of a piece of computer software that does a particular job
